section_one.subtitle: Enjoy exhibitions at home

about.title: <0>About </0>Us
about.description: Tantora is a platform for organizing and conducting online exhibitions, whose mission is to unite exhibition centers, exhibition organizers, exhibitors and visitors into a single network for more efficient, convenient and economical promotion and search of goods and services in international and local markets.

item1.title: Free
item1.description: Pacrticipate at exhibitions for free wihout going out of your home

item2.title: Chat
item2.description: Chat or make audio and video calls with companies, they will demonstrate everything that interests you

item3.title: Planning
item3.description: Planning for productive participation in exhibitions, forums and conferences

item5.title: Accessibility
item5.description: Quick access to targeted information about the achievements of companies, their products and services

item6.title: Online Streams
item6.description: Watch and participate in onine stream shows and online conferences. Watch both the presentations of exhibitors and the speeches of experts and specialists of topics and industries of interest to you

item1.title: Opportunity
item1.description: An effective opportunity to strengthen business positions and enter new markets

item3.title: Innovation
item3.description: Using innovative tools for effective online exhibitions

item4.title: Optimization
item4.description: Cost optimization and maximum effect of participation in exhibitions, forums and conferences

item5.title: Communication
item5.description: Communication with business partners and visitors is carried out using video and online chat. Exhibitors always stay in touch with potential customers, investors, and partners

item6.title: Online Streams
item6.description: You no longer need to pay for renting space for a company stand, installation, printing of materials. To participate in the virtual exhibition, you do not need to pay the fare to exhibitors and pay for the delivery of demonstration goods
